articles.author: Press Trust of India
articles.title: "Understand BCCI's Position": PCB Chief On Need For Asia Cup Hybrid Model - NDTV Sports
articles.description: The city of Lahore will host matches in Pakistan while the games to be played in Sri Lanka will be held in Kandy and Pallekele.
articles.content: Ending months of speculation around Asia Cup, the Asian Cricket Council (ACC) on Thursday announced that the tournament will be staged in a hybrid model with four games in Pakistan and nine in Sri La… [+2799 chars]
